meanings.definition: A type of food or dish
meanings.sent1: The speise on the plate looked delicious.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a variety of speise for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat sniffed the speise suspiciously before walking away.
meanings.sent4: The speise of knowledge was served at the educational seminar.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the speise filled the room, making everyone hungry.
